title: Market capitalization of leading 100 banks worldwide 2016 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
Quarter Q4 '17 has 1.37 times more Market capitalization in trillion Euros than Quarter Q2 '16 which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in trillion Euros for 15 number of Quarters.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Market capitalization in trillion Euros in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '17 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '16.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in trillion Euros for 15 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 '17 has the highest Market capitalization in trillion Euros and Q2 '16 has the lowest Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
Quarter Q1 '17 has the second highest value for Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
The difference of Market capitalization in trillion Euros between the highest and lowest Quarter is 1.5.
The Quarter Q4 '17 has the highest Market capitalization in trillion Euros, followed by Q1 '17, and Q1 '17. Down to the Quarter Q2 '16 which is the lowest.
Over the past 15 Quarters, the Market capitalization in trillion Euros has decreased.
Quarter Q2 '19, Q1 '19, Q2 '18, and Q4 '16 have the same Market capitalization in trillion Euros.
The Quarter Q2 '16 tends to be 1.11 percent lower than average.
The Market capitalization in trillion Euros is 76.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
